nav.div: Buena Vista City Public Schools » Our School System » BVCPS COVID-19 Information Page

strong.br:
Timely and honest communication for our school community
PLEASE KNOW THAT INFORMATION/GUIDANCE GIVEN TO US BY OUR STATE AGENCIES CHANGES DAILY
They are human and just like us, have never had to deal with any circumstance that comes close to this.
Our SchoolMessenger notices provide the current, albeit fluid, guidance and mandates provided to us in our online meetings.
This is an unprecedented era and every person on our staff is only concerned with what is best for our students.
If you have a concern over assignments, please contact your principal. They will work with you any way possible.
We ask for your patience and willingness to connect with us with your concerns.
Together, we WILL figure this out and be a stronger Blue community.
